name: aws-backup-manager
description: Automatically back up EBS volumes using tags

scripts.test: npm run mocha && npm run coveralls
scripts.cover: babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --report text --report html node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter dot
scripts.coveralls: babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --report lcovonly node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --reporter mocha-lcov-reporter && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js

author: Trioxis
